user.title: Select whether to use a local or a cloud connection

data.email: Your email, or "Local" if using local lan
data.password: Your password, or "Local" if using local lan
data.scan_interval: Message scan interval in seconds. No faster than 15 seconds is recommened for cloud connections.
data.fast_scan_interval: After issuing a command (setpoint change, hvac mode change, etc.) The system goes into a fast scan mode, in order to make the UI more responsive to commands
data.allergen_defender_switch: Create a switch entity to allow control of allergenDefender mode
data.app_id: Specify the unique application id to use. In most cases, having the integration autogenerate one works fine. See documentation
data.init_wait_time: Wait time in seconds for configuration to complete. Increase this value if you see initialization timeouts
data.pii_in_message_logs: Include personal information in log files
data.message_debug_file: Optional file to log messages to
data.log_messages_to_file: Log S30 message to seperate file
